#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ll n,t,ans,i;
	ll fact[22];fact[0]=1;
	for(i=1;i<=20;++i)
	{
		fact[i]=fact[i-1]*i;
	}
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<=n;++i)
		{
			if(i&1)
			{
				ans-=fact[n]/fact[i];
			//	printf("%lld %lld \n",fact[n],fact[i]);
			}
			else 
			{
				ans+=fact[n]/fact[i];
		//	printf("%lld %lld \n",fact[n],fact[i]);
				
			}	
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
